com.stormpath.sdk.api

Class ApiKeys

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stormpath.sdk.api.ApiKeys

  • public final class ApiKeys
extends Object
    Static utility/helper methods for working with ApiKey resources. Most methods are factory methods used for forming ApiKey-specific fluent DSL queries. for example: 
     ApiKeys.criteria()
     .offsetBy(50)
     .limitTo(25)
     .withTenant()
     .withAccount();
    or, if using static imports: 
     import static com.stormpath.sdk.api.ApiKeys.*;

 ...

  criteria()
     .offsetBy(50)
     .limitTo(25)
     .withTenant()
     .withAccount();
    This class can also be used for working with ApiKey resources. For example: 
     ApiKeys.builder()
     .setFileLocation(path)
     .build();
    Since:
    1.0.RC

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApiKeys() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ApiKeyBuilder builder()
      Returns a new ApiKeyBuilder instance, used to construct ApiKey instances to authenticate the calls to Stormpath.
      static ApiKeyCriteria criteria()
      Returns a new ApiKeyCriteria instance to use to formulate an ApiKey query.
      static ApiKeyOptions<ApiKeyOptions> options()
      Returns a new ApiKeyOptions instance, used to customize how one or more ApiKeys are retrieved.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • options

        public static ApiKeyOptions<ApiKeyOptions> options()
        Returns a new ApiKeyOptions instance, used to customize how one or more ApiKeys are retrieved.
        Returns:
        a new ApiKeyOptions instance, used to customize how one or more ApiKeys are retrieved.

      • criteria

        public static ApiKeyCriteria criteria()
        Returns a new ApiKeyCriteria instance to use to formulate an ApiKey query.

        For example: 

         ApiKeyCriteria criteria = ApiKeys.criteria()
     .offsetBy(50)
     .limitTo(25)
     .withTenant()
     .withAccount();
        Returns:
        a new ApiKeyCriteria instance to use to formulate an ApiKey query.

      • builder

        public static ApiKeyBuilder builder()
        Returns a new ApiKeyBuilder instance, used to construct ApiKey instances to authenticate the calls to Stormpath.
        Returns:
        a new ApiKeyBuilder instance, used to construct ApiKey instances to authenticate the calls to Stormpath.
